name: Guardians of Arcadia - Episode 1
storyline: General Nero of Baikal has begun using highly advanced weapons to terrorize neighboring kingdoms. With their homeland destroyed, Hikaru, his sister Aki, and a group of unlikely characters embark to a journey to end the evil general's desire to dominate the world. Soon after, they discover the general threats merely cover a far more sinister plot.
summary: Guardians of Arcadia® is a single-player JRPG with inspiration from the successes of the 1990’s. incorporating popular elements from games of the decade like chibi character design, random battles, a strategic turn-based combat system, and a fully 3D explorable world.
